article: Bruce is my good friend. There are four people in his family. His parents  _  both English teachers. He  has  a little brother.  _  name is Peter. Peter is only five years old. He doesn't go to school and he doesn't know  how  to read or write. Now I am at Bruce's home. I see Peter sitting at the table with a pen  _  his hand. "What are you doing, Peter?" I ask. " I'm writing  _  my friend, Bill." Says Peter. " But how  can you  write?" I ask again. "You don't know the words, because you don't go to  school  ". With a smile, Peter says, "But it doesn't matter because my  _  and I know the words on the moon. I write to him in the moon language . It's easy for him to read my letter. I tell him an interesting story. I'm sure Bill will be  _  to read it." What an interesting answer it is!
